#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
    int tcase;
    scanf("%d",&tcase);
    while(tcase--)
    {
        int i,l,j=0;
        char a[100];
        scanf("%s",a);
        l=strlen(a);
        for(i=0;i<l;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]=='a' || a[i]=='e' || a[i]=='i' || a[i]=='o' || a[i]=='u' || a[i]=='A' || a[i]=='E' || a[i]=='I' || a[i]=='O' || a[i]=='U')
            {
                j=1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(j==1)
        printf("yes\n");
        else
        printf("no\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
